MathExpression.Id: Motor Controler Estimated Energy Per Lap
MathExpression.Script: integrate('Motor Controller Estimated Power Output' [kW], 1, range_change("Outings:Laps"))
stat_max('Motor Controler Estimated Energy Per Lap' [kW.h], 1, range_change("Outings:Laps")) * ( 22 / stat_max('distance reset' [km], 1, range_change("Outings:Laps")) )
Choose('Motor Controller Estimated Power Output' [kW] > 30, 30, 'Motor Controller Estimated Power Output' [kW])

MathExpression.Id: Total 25kW Limited Motor Controller Energy Use
Total 30 kW Limited Motor Controller Energy Use

MathExpression.Script: Choose('Motor Controller Estimated Power Output' [kW] > 025, 25, 'Motor Controller Estimated Power Output' [kW])
